name: World War: Global Clash
description:
Fight other warriors for cash, complete missions and more.

Become a Warrior and explore your surroundings searching for money and gaining experience.

Earn money for missions, fight other warriors and search for buildings based on your location in real life to earn money and experience!

Features:
*Multiplayer online World War RPG for the iPhone, iPod, and iPad.
*Buy buildings based on your location in real life! Visit buildings that you don't own to get cash!
*Buy and sell units at the Barracks
*Upgrade your stats after gaining experience points to become a better Warrior!
*Invite your friends via friend codes to grow your platoon.
*GameCenter Leaderboard and Achievements
*Free updates with new features, missions, and units.

If you're a fan of Pirates, Mob Wars, Mafia Wars, iMob, Vampires, iVampires, or other online role playing games, check out World War!

The World War app requires a Facebook account or cell phone number for login. This is used so you can reconnect to your account if you change devices.

World War is an online game only. iPod Touch users need to be connected to WiFi to play. World War is a location-based game, in order to purchase buildings in the game, your device must be able to use built-in the location sensor.
